text: Sanday is one of the inhabited islands of Orkney, Scotland. It covers an area of . It is the third largest of the Orkney Islands.Haswell-Smith (2004) p. 334 The main centres of population are Lady Village and Kettletoft. Sanday can be reached by Orkney Ferries or plane from Kirkwall on the Orkney Mainland. Cultural activities revolve around the school. ==Climate== ==References== Category:Orkney
title: Sanday, Orkney
